test_format_items: Three sections: Verbal, Numerical, and Diagrammatic
Each section is timed (15 minutes per section)

verbal_section.title: Verbal Analysis
verbal_section.description: Test your verbal reasoning and language skills

numerical_section.title: Numerical Analysis
numerical_section.description: Test your mathematical and analytical abilities

diagrammatic_section.title: Diagrammatic Analysis
diagrammatic_section.description: Test your pattern recognition and logical thinking
